data.message: I got a new iPhone 6+ , tried to transfer my FB account to new phone couldn't . On my other iPone 5 I sign in with just my number into FB was easy . I tried to sign the same way , it wouldn't let me . Won't let me verified my Moble number . Yahoo is how I got to into my account , that account was deleted , did't let me get my up date account . So now I'm confused and running two FB page now , how can I correct this problem ? I need help help to have this problem fix ?

replies.message: Hi Lou. If you're still having trouble logging into your Facebook account on your iPhone, please try these tips from our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1jv45oM. You can also learn more about deleting or deactivating a profile on Facebook here: http://on.fb.me/1BZa66z. We hope this helps! -Rose
I have three account and how do I find and delete those permanently , it all came up from my yahoo account after switch phone 5 to 6+ iPhone .
